meanings.definition: A type of small freshwater fish often kept as pets.
meanings.sent1: My sister loves her bettas and takes good care of them.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of colorful bettas for sale.
meanings.sent3: The bettas in the tank seemed to be having a little party.
meanings.sent4: The bettas swam gracefully in the aquarium, like tiny dancers.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the first time I saw bettas at the pet store.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'betta', referring to more than one individual fish.
meanings.sent1: We bought three bettas to add to our fish tank.
meanings.sent2: The bettas in the aquarium looked vibrant and healthy.
meanings.sent3: The bettas seemed to be gossiping with each other in their own fishy language.
meanings.sent4: The bettas shimmered like jewels in the water, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The children were delighted to watch the bettas swim around in circles.
